text: Dr May is the best GP ever - she’s very kind and patient , listened carefully to my concerns and her diagnosis was very clear and astute. Very clean and nice clinic too!
Really friendly front desk staff and doctor. Clinic is clean and crowd is low, so we really like it here !

Dear Dr. May,

Thank you so much for your time and care today.  I appreciate your thorough examination and helpful advice.
Visit you soon.

I highly recommend River Valley Medical & Surgery for anyone looking for reliable and professional healthcare. The doctors are very experienced, patient, and take the time to explain everything clearly. The staff is friendly and helpful, and the clinic is clean and well-organized. I always feel well taken care of during each visit. Whether it’s a general consultation or something more specific, I trust them completely with my health.

Dr May explains the issue and medications in detail. I felt comfortable telling her my concerns and she’ll address them and give alternatives when possible. Joanne, the reception lady, is friendly and helpful.
